# Piercing Shriek, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Sonic Spells|sonic]]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Bard Spells|Bard 4]], [[4th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 7]], [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 feet + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** The Mage's Tower

With this spell, you utter a sharp, abrupt scream, sending forth a burst of sonic energy to the target. The burst of sonic energy strikes the target for 1d8 damage + 1d8 per 2 levels. In addition, if the victim fails their saving throw, they may only take a partial action on their next initiative. Creatures unable to hear cannot be [[Staggered|staggered]].
